page.title: 09Roads at Weston
page.content: The busy trunk road A43(T) between Oxford and Stamford,Lincolnshire,runs directly north and south through the parishes of Weston-on-the-Green and Chesterton. A planned extension of the M40 motorway from London to Birmingham is scheduled to be completed by 1989 and the route of this motorway will also be north and south through the parishes,parallel with the A43 but approximately 2 Km. to the east. It is anticipated that this motorway will relieve the present heavy traffic use of the A43 which is currently averaging 12,500 vehicles a day.
